title: Adele releases music video for 'Hello'
text:
The video for Adele's first new song since 2012 is out - and fans are freaking out all over the world.
Check out the video for "Hello" below.
>> Read more trending stories
“My last record was a break up record and if I had to label this one I would call it a make up record. I’m making up with myself. Making up for lost time. Making up for everything I ever did and never did.”
Adele is set to release her much-anticipated new album, “25,” on Friday November 20th.
The video was shot in the Montreal countryside and is directed by Xavier Dolan.
TRACKLIST
1. Hello
2. Send My Love (To Your New Lover)
3. I Miss You
4. When We Were Young
5. Remedy
6. Water Under The Bridge
7. River Lea
8. Love In The Dark
9. Million Years Ago
10. All I Ask
11. Sweetest Devotion
